price: (Yεbεka akyerε no sε): “Kenkan wo nwoma. Wo ara wo som bo (sε) wobu woho akonta nnԑ da yi“.
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
